mapper.select: SELECT debatecolSeq, debateTitle, fromDate, colPers, partPers, openDate, (select userId from userinfo ui where ui.userSeq = #{value}) as userId FROM nonfacedebatecollect WHERE userSeq = #{value} ORDER BY debatecolSeq DESC
SELECT n.debatecolSeq, n.debateTitle, n.fromDate, n.colPers, n.partPers, n.openDate, u.userId FROM nonfacedebatecollect n, userinfo u WHERE n.userSeq = u.userSeq ORDER BY n.debatecolSeq DESC

SELECT n.debatecolSeq, n.debateTitle, n.fromDate, n.colPers, n.partPers, n.openDate, n.debateCon, n.userSeq, u.userId FROM nonfacedebatecollect n, userinfo u WHERE n.userSeq = u.userSeq AND n.debatecolSeq = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nonfacedebatecollect(userSeq, debateTitle, fromDate, colPers, debateCon) VALUES (#{userSeq}, #{debateTitle}, #{fromDate}, #{colPers}, #{debateCon})
mapper.select: select partPers from nonfacedebatecollect WHERE debatecolSeq = #{debateSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nonfacedebatechat ( userSeq, userId, chatCon, writeDate ) VALUES ( #{userSeq}, #{userId}, #{chatCon}, now())
